text: It uses a relative link, so when you actually deploy the page it will work. We have been looking into a better way to show preview data but nothing out yet. As a temporary measure you can put in the domain you want in the template if you would like to preview under that domain
Thanks <@U6GNQ7JBU>, that means every time i want to see changes on the page, I'll have to check it with the relative link which appears when we select a domain?
